publicityLines.line: order a Visa Classic * credit card that is free for the first year.
Both are included in your Hello4You pack.
Visa Classic card (free for the first year) *
Once your request has been accepted and confirmed, you will enjoy the benefits of a bank card and a free current account until you reach the age of 28, but also:
access to your bank online and via your mobile with Easy Banking Web and Easy Banking App **;
expert advice from our advisers remotely by phone and digital channels (Hello team);
the Hello world (concerts, special offers, competitions etc.).
